name: Angels Onward
description:
How to Play:

The controls of the game are quite simple. Move the mouse up and down to move vertically. Mouse click will fire and consume mana, but make sure to keep an eye on how much mana you have left. Mana will regenerate slowly when not firing. Collecting 100 ribbons will grant you an extra life, and collecting rings will replenish your mana a bit.
